content: description my favorite latte in a blanket these colors reminded me of my favorite psl coffee and helped add an extra dose of cozy to it the relaxing repeat worked on the bias is full of texture whilst having a fun blend of random stripes available as a kit via lion brand yarn and on my blog as well website at whistleandwool chart not included on the blog pdf only notes chart included which tracks color row stitch counts in addition to the written pattern beginning chain doesn t count as a stitch odd row are rs row even are ws row this blanket is worked on the bias matching gauge or getting very close ensures your blanket will be a similar size i didn t carry my yarn up the sides because the distance was too much cut your yarn between changes you will work an edging around the blanket when it is done for a smooth edge buy 2 patterns get 2 free- add all 4 to your cart pattern sizes one size finished measurements in inches width 45 5 length 54 5 skill level crochet beginner lion brand hue and me 137 yd #5 4 4 oz 80% acrylic 20% wool skeins needed 8 - color a- desert 2 - color b- grapefruit be cozy be kind i n s t a g r a m @whistleandwool copyright restrictions ***these patterns are copyright of whistle and wool© so you may not copy alter adjust share record redistribute or resell my pattern you also do not have permission to use any of my photos
